title: Paul Hollywood's ex Summer Monteys-Fullam turning family into the 'Kent Kardashians'
text:
Next up: Keeping Up With The Monteys-Fullam’s (Picture: Backgrid)

Paul Hollywood’s ex Summer Monteys-Fullam is set on turning her family into the Kardashians of Kent, according to reports.

The 24-year-old, along with her mother Sabina and businesswoman sister Saskia are said to be called the nickname ‘Kent Kardashians’ by their friends due to the influence of their mother.

A representative for Summer said: ‘Sabina has no input into [Summer’s] management or career but obviously as any mother would, wants the best for her daughter.’

Well, it is a bit too much of a coincidence that all their names begin with S’s.

Kris Jenner would be so proud.

Sources told The Mirror: ‘Their nickname from friends, mainly towards the mum, eldest daughter Saskia and Summer are the Kent Kardashians.’

Momager Kris Jenner famously manages all her children and Sabina is said to be following in her footsteps by looking after her girls’ careers as well.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Sabina manages all her children (Picture: sabinamonteysfullam/ instagram)

Her sister Saskia owns a lash line (Picture: Instagram)

Apparently the idea to keep their fame for as long as possible was sparked by Sabina as she ‘sees herself as a Kris Jenner figure’.

Does this make Paul the Rob Kardashian or Caitlyn Jenner of the situation?

Summer rose to fame when she started dating the Great British Bake Off judge and ever since the two broke up, she has been seen at endless events.

The two broke up when he asked her to sign a non-disclosure agreement on their relationship.

Recently, Summer claimed that she never ‘asked’ for a life of fame but she isn’t closing the doors that are opening.

Speaking of being thrust into the spotlight, she said: ‘It’s been an adventure, and I’ve taken it in my stride, I will continue to be true to myself and not get lost.’

But she added: ‘I didn’t ask for this.

Kris Jenner is ready to teach Sabina everything she knows (Picture: E!)

She denied wanting fame on Fubar Radio a few weeks ago (Picture: Bob Grey / BACKGRID)

‘I didn’t ask for these doors to be opened, the world sucked me into it – in a good way, a really good way – and now I want to see what my options are.’

When quizzed about those options during her first interview on Fubar Radio podcast Access All Areas, she continued: ‘I have a few things, I can’t talk about anything in detail but I have some amazing TV presenting coming up, I am reading a few scripts, which you may have seen when I was on holiday.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Summer has never attended acting school, and admitted that the only experience she has is ‘in front of the mirror’.

The Kardashians haven’t been to acting school either, but their show is still a drama-filled rollercoaster ride.

MORE: Paul Hollywood’s ex Summer Monteys-Fullam drops legal case against GBBO star
description: Summer Monteys-Fullam is trying to turn her family into the Kardashians of Kent and her mother is set to be the momager.
